data.title: Dinner at the Manchester Museum - British and Irish Hypertension Society

data.meta_site_name: British and Irish Hypertension Society | Registered UK Charity No. 287635
data.text:
Dinner at the Manchester Museum

All conference delegates are invited to attend the conference party at the stunning Manchester Museum (World of Fossils Exhibition), for which we have exclusive use.

Manchester Museum, one of the largest university museums in the UK, is over one hundred and thirty years old and an impressive venue for this year’s event and the exhibition is sure to provide a spectacular backdrop.

The 2024 BIHS conference dinner will include a drinks reception, 3-course meal and tea and coffee.

Tickets are priced at £60.00 per person.

Tickets for early career researchers and students are £30.00 per person.

Make sure you join us for what promises to be a truly memorable event. We would love to see you there.

Venue: Manchester Museum

Date: Monday 9th September 2024

Time: 19:00 to 23:00

You can book your ticket during registration or by emailing us at bihs@in-conference.org.uk

This social programme is self-funded, independent from our sponsor’s support.
